title: Share of people owning microwave ovens in Germany 2008 to 2017
summary: This statistic presents the development of share of current account holders , who use mobile banking to communicate with their bank at least once a month in the united kingdom ( uk ) from 2008 to 2017 . By 2015 , it can be seen that 34 percent of respondents stated they used mobile banking at least once a month . The increases observed in mobile banking usage were steep over time : in 2010 , only 8 percent of current account holders on the British market turned monthly to mobile banking as a secure way of communicating with their bank .
gold: The figure shows the share of households owning microwave ovens in Germany from 2008 to 2017 . Over the time period under consideration , microwave oven ownership has decreased from 80 percent of respondents in 2008 to 65 percent in 2017 .
